p: L. nobilis leaves were collected in February 2016, in Montecorice, Cilento area (Campania, Southern Italy, 40°14′9″24 N, 14°59′13″20 E), 90 m above sea level. Representative homogeneous samples of population were collected during the balsamic time. The plant was identified by Prof. V. De Feo, on the basis of Flora d’Italia [ 35] and a voucher specimen has been deposited in the Herbarium of the Medical Botany Chair of the University of Salerno.
